Name: DVIR Form: Chevrolet Silverado
Description: Driver Vehicle Inspection Report for Chevrolet Silverado with Extended Compliance and Preventive Maintenance Checks

Items.Name: Front Photo
Items.Comment: Take photo of vehicle front

Items.Name: Right Photo
Items.Comment: Take photo of vehicle right side

Items.Name: Back Photo
Items.Comment: Take photo of vehicle rear

Items.Name: Left Photo
Items.Comment: Take photo of vehicle left side

Items.Name: Headlights (both beams)
Items.Comment: Check low and high beam operation

Items.Name: Brake Lights (all)
Items.Comment: Verify all brake lights illuminate

Items.Name: Backup Lights (both)
Items.Comment: Check operation when in reverse

Items.Name: Turn Signals (both sides)
Items.Comment: Check front and rear indicators

Items.Name: Interior Lights (cab)
Items.Comment: Verify ceiling and courtesy lights

Items.Name: Headlight Reflectors
Items.Comment: Check for cracks or damage

Items.Name: Tail Light Reflectors
Items.Comment: Verify reflectors intact and clean

Items.Name: Side Reflectors (both)

Items.Name: Tire Pressure (all)
Items.Comment: Check PSI on all four tires

Items.Comment: Check for cracks, dents, bends

Items.Name: Windshield Wipers (operation)

Items.Name: Windshield Wiper Fluid
Items.Comment: Verify reservoir filled

Items.Comment: Check attachment and operation

Items.Name: Side Mirrors (both)
Items.Comment: Verify secure and properly adjusted

Items.Name: Horn (operation)
Items.Comment: Test both short and long blast

Items.Name: Glass/Windows (condition)
Items.Comment: Check for cracks, proper operation

Items.Name: Body Damage (exterior)
Items.Comment: Look for dents, scratches, rust areas

Items.Name: Bed Condition (pickup)
Items.Comment: Check for rust, cracks, loose panels

Items.Name: Tailgate (operation)

Items.Comment: Check for separation or damage

Items.Comment: Look for cracks, bending, corrosion

Items.Name: Seatbelts (all positions)

Items.Comment: Verify all windows operate smoothly

Items.Name: First Aid Kit (if required)

Items.Comment: Check reservoir level

Items.Name: Engine Air Filter (condition)
Items.Comment: Inspect for dirt accumulation
